effect.ruby_sapphire: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.emerald: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.firered_leafgreen: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.colosseum: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.xd: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The user swaps special abilities with the target.
flavor_text.emerald: The user swaps special abilities with the target.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user employs its psychic power to swap abilities with the foe.
